message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal considering its value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I understand your perspective.  While I appreciate your offer, I'm not quite ready to go that low. I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This still gives you a good deal, and it's closer to what I need to make this worth my time.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,250. That's my final offer
